description: center rectangle, 14-1/4" x 12", made up of geometric patterns of cross stitch surrounded by parallel rows of snowflake cross stitch; geometric cross stitch pattern on ends complete solid cross stitch covering; black, orange, white, green with black fringe; four yarn corner ties
dimension:

title: Head Wrap
